page.title: 08POPULATION IN STOCKSBRIDGE
page.content: THE POPULATION OF STOCKSBRIDGE AND DEEPCAR IN THE 1981 CENSUS WAS 13,975.THE BIRTHRATE IN STOCKSBRIDGE IN 1984 WAS 11.1 PER 1000. THERE ARE 2166 PEOPLE IN STOCKSBRIDGE OVER THE AGE OF RETIREMENT.THE VAST MAJORITY OF THE PEOPLE OF STOCKSBRIDGE ARE WORKING CLASS,WHO WORK IN A VARIETY OF JOBS,RATHER THAN YEARS AGO,WHEN THE MAJORITY WORKED FOR THE STEEL FIRM OF SAMUEL FOX. THERE ARE MIDDLE CLASS AREAS,WHICH TEND TO BE ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF STOCKSBRIDGE,ADJACENT TO THE OPEN COUNTRYSIDE.
